thread.title: Cool Spaces: Kris and developer Fred Geis' downtown condo with a view (photos, video)
thread.title_full: Cool Spaces: Kris and developer Fred Geis' downtown condo with a view (photos, video)

author: Julie Washington, The Plain Dealer
title: Cool Spaces: Kris and developer Fred Geis' downtown condo with a view (photos, video)
text: Kris and Fred Geis live in a two-story, contemporary condo in the Avenue at E. 12th Street and St. Clair Avenue. It reflects Kris' taste, from its eye-dazzling chandeliers to its plush shag carpet.
